description: Create delicious truffles in 25 minutes with a Caramel Mud Cake, white choc melts and sprinkles. What a treat!
name: Caramelised Mud Cake Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place mud cake in a large bowl. Using hands, break up cake and combine into a soft dough.

Using damp hands, roll mixture into 12 balls. Place chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high for 1 minute, stirring occasionally, until melted and smooth. Using 2 forks to hold a truffle, dip truffles, one at a time, in chocolate to coat, allowing excess chocolate to drip off. Place on prepared tray.
Scatter gold sprinkles over truffles. Allow to set. Serve.
